FAQs

Learn how our product works so you can commute with peace of mind.

What is Bike Buddy?

Bike Buddy is a safe and secure way to secure your bike through a mobile app which lets you virtually lock your bike.

Why should we use it?

The app creates an excellent preventative measure for not having to worry about your bike when you're in class - our emergency sensors will prevent thiefs from stealing your bike.

Is it good?

Yes.

Have a problem with Bike Buddy? Let us know about it by heading over to our contact page!
